title: To-Do List
description: Created a full-featured To-Do List application using the MERN stack with user authentication, task CRUD operations, and a clean responsive interface for managing daily tasks efficiently.

title: E-Commerce Application
description: Built a dynamic e-commerce platform using the MERN stack with features like authentication, product management, cart system, and responsive UI for seamless shopping experience.

title: Expense Tracer
description: Developed a personal expense tracker using the MERN stack enabling user registration, authentication, expense CRUD operations, and history tracking with a clean interface.

title: Responsive Travel App
description: Developed a responsive travel website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript featuring destination highlights, modern design, and interactive user experience.

title: Credit-Cards-Management
description: Developed a credit card management system using MERN stack with admin panel, CRUD operations for cards and banks, and a user-friendly dashboard interface.

title: Online Study Point
description: Designed an online study portal using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with structured learning resources, interactive UI components, and visually engaging layouts.

title: Music Application
description: Created a responsive music streaming app using MERN stack with modern search, player controls, tab switching, and API-based data loading for smooth music playback features.
